meanings.definition: Providing or promoting rest or relaxation
meanings.sent1: The hammock was the restfullest spot in the garden.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, the cozy bed felt restfullest.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy pillows made the couch the restfullest place to nap.
meanings.sent4: Her soothing voice was the restfullest sound he had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze on the peaceful beach was the restfullest experience of all.

meanings.definition: Being at rest or in a state of relaxation
meanings.sent1: The cat looked the restfullest when curled up by the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: The calm lake appeared restfullest under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The sleeping baby was the restfullest sight in the room.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the park seemed the restfullest among all the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The starry night sky was the restfullest view from the mountaintop.
